Description:
Detects the removal of a deployment from a Kubernetes cluster.
This could indicate disruptive activity aiming to impact business operations.


Author: Leo Tsaousis (@laripping)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Deployment Deleted From Kubernetes Cluster
Query: sourcetype='kubernetes-audit' eql select * from _source_ where verb = 'delete' and objectref.resource = 'deployments'
